body: This is the only exception to a pornhwa or manhwa 18+ due to it's being the only one uncensored in existence, the others are stained with that stupid lightsaber censorship or the nipple censor (which is the reason why there's so many sex scenes with the girl having their bra on). Sad to see some really good arts got ruined like that damn. And there's literally no group or anyone decensoring it either sigh.
It's hard to imagine that this is almost the only uncensored manhwa.
I love your doing idol i hope to see new chapter and its the best
Well, the translation is a little funky, but it's brilliant nonetheless
is this "gangnam style"?
this is sooooo gooood i need moreeeeeeeeee

I deadass need more doujshins like this that focus more on story like bruh this is so fucking good.

I cant be the only one that has been noticing Korean web comics slowly taking over nhentai recently.... Not like I'm going to fucking complain. Literally 100s of pages of well fleshed out content is great
i like the story
Came for the thumbnail, came from the thumbnail, but stayed for good story and “chocolate muscles”.

After reading all pages I have realized that I want more of this. At first, I expected this to be just another thing I could only fap to but after reading all of it, I enjoyed the story more than the lewd scenes. In conclusion I shall now be waiting for the drop of the next of this series.
Omfg its storyline is fucking good
"Chocolate muscles" lol
Damn it it just went up funny and now i want moar
https://kimmundo-artwork.blogspot.com/2017/08/cartoonists-nsfw-20.html
its a master piece both the art and writing heck there is even a plot twist i completeli agree with Jndlel_Kun2

I came here for the "plot" not for the plot. But accidentally, I liked the plot. Kudos to the author of this comic. Makes me anxious about the next chapter and I'd rather read the whole thing than fap and skip only to the sex scenes.

About 2 hours and 2 Boxes of chocolates later I have read all 613 pages. I understand a lot of things in it, I understand the Producers motives and why she is doing what she is doing and still, I feel like re-reading this all over again out of the shire fact I crave more. 



If I have to lose absolutely everything to see the end of this story, by god you will strip everything good away from me, then proceed to twist it into an amalgamated form no longer recognisable to its original with pure evil on every part of it, then proceed to beat me to near death with it day in day out! As long as I get to see the finished product of this perfectly crafted story, it WILL all be worth it.

So a single doujin expects me to read 613 pages? What does it think I am, A lowlife scum that has no social life and would levitate to this thing with reading glasses and a box of chocolates next to me? *Proceeds to put on reading glasses*
What’s with all this nonsense? I like it and want more xD
How to download from android?
Cool
6/10 for overall fap-ability, 8/10 for story/comedy
